name: CASTAWAY (GwowGame!)
description:
Can you defeat the evil crabs, and get away from this island survived? Collect all parts of the ship to rebuild it. Make sure you are full on hunger, or you won't heal. 

ARROW or LEFT STICK to MOVE

SPACE or SQUARE(X) to ATTACK and board the ship

ESC or START to skip cutscenes

Good luck! How fast can you beat it anyway?

GwowGame! bring this game to you brought by the PlixerJam here on itch.io!

Did we win?
